verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, the Savior, reigns, The God of truth and love. When He had purged our stains, He took His seat above. Lift up your heart, lift up your voice! Rejoice, again I say, rejoice!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His Kingdom cannot fail. He rules o’er earth and heaven. The keys of death and hell are to our Jesus given. Lift up your heart, lift up your voice! Rejoice, again I say, rejoice!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
